main event: On August 7, 1956, two military personnel observed a small round object hovering near the F.E. Warren Air Force Base in Cheyenne, Wyoming.
interesting points: The object was described as being approximately 20-25 feet in diameter and silver in color., It was observed hovering 300-400 feet above the ground before moving at an estimated speed of 300-400 mph., Both witness statements were made at approximately 2:30 PM MST and were consistent in their descriptions., A civilian report indicated a cigar-shaped UFO observed earlier that morning., The investigation remains open for possible future reference.
sighted object: a small round object and a cigar-shaped object
witness description: Sergeant Miller and Airman First Class Wilcox (both from USAF), and an anonymous civilian.
